document.full_text: lamar odom, who became the first los angeles laker to win the nba award for best player in a reserve role on tuesday, hopes the recognition will make people think twice before considering him an underachiever.
document.title: lakers' lamar odom voted league's best bench player
lines_and_colors: lamar odom, who became the first los angeles laker to win the nba award for best player in a reserve role on tuesday, hopes the recognition will make people think twice before considering him an underachiever.
